评论概述: Great suit, ran big for my slim guy
评论详情: I purchased in a size 8 years for my 8 year old who is wearing size 8 jeans, 7/8 shorts and shirts at Target and Old Navy. First off, I loved this on him! Beautiful color blue, the blue fabric is not too thick or thin, it lays very nicely; loved the tie, you can adjust the vest with buckle in back, pants also have adjustable waist with button zip fly, however shirt is a little thin and has pleated bib front like a traditional tux (wish it was not). Despite being adjustable the pants were too big for my son as he is rather slim, height 4’4” and weighs about 54#, and you can see in the picture the crotch inseam just hangs too long for him. The shirt was too wide at the shoulders for him as well, the seam was probably at least an inch and a half over his shoulder. I am exchanging for smaller size. Great value for the money!

类型: Size: 8 YearsColor: Blue Suit Blue Plaid Tie
评论详情: My son wore this for a school project to look like Nikola Tesla.  It looked so good on him and fit really well for his size.  I was impressed with the quality of everything.  I only need to tighten the tie, by tying a knot in the elastic band attached to it, so it fit correctly.  That would be the only thing I would improve - adding something to cinch the elastic, but I was able to take care of it.  I wish we had a special occasion for him to wear it again, because it looked so great!  I was afraid of the results of washing it, but it washed really well on normal wash and a delicate dry.  The last photo shows what it looked like after a wash. I accidentally let the load of wash cool down and it still only had a few wrinkles.  I will definitely order this again if we need a suit in the next size.

类型: Size: 8 YearsColor: Blue Suit Blue Plaid Tie
评论详情: I really like the quality of the suit jacket, vest, and pants.  Sizes are accurate.  This is certainly a slim fit.  The shirt is of fair quality, but needs to be worn with a vest as the pleats do not go all the way down the shirt.  The tie was a huge disappointment. It is only an elastic string that goes around the neck (kinda dangerous).  It can be adjusted by moving the tied knot, but it is far from ideal.  This part was so bad, I bought another multi-pack of ties once I saw it.  The tie that came with the size 7 was for a toddler/baby.  With the size 8, it was appropriately sized, but still... the elastic string was horrible.  If you have other shirt/tie options, the suit is worth it.  Machine washable.... huge plus!

类型: Size: 12 YearsColor: Blue Suit Blue Plaid Tie

He actually liked it too!
